post:
I'll drop our 20FOR30 shared hosting offer since it worked well last time.

CPU: AMD EPYC 7502P
Location: Germany
Space: 20GB SSD
Price $30 annually, recurring.

CloudLinux, Imunify360, MailChannels delivery, DirectAdmin, LiteSpeed, Litespeed crawler enabled, composer and Redis object caching.

LVE limits are:

200% CPU
4 GB RAM
20 MB/s IO
10240 IOPS
50 EP
100 NPROC

https://customer.duelhost.dk/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&billingcycle=annually&language=English&currency=4&promocode=20FOR30

Price gets updated before payment.
